subheader.value: Spring Funding Group empowers your business with custom financing options and premier business services, allowing you to focus on the things that really matter to your business.

note.value: Extremely knowledgeable specialists who understand your specific business financing and operational needs.
Get the financing and business solutions you need to manage and grow your business in 24 - 48 hours.
Access the best rates on a wide variety of financing options and premier business services to innovate, grow, and compete.

header.value: Completely customized financial solution to meet your business needs

subheader.value: Fast and flexible custom financing solutions help you overcome your business challenges.

body.html:
Spring Funding Group understands how a loan at the right time can make a huge difference in the success of your business. To that end, we’ve made it fast and easy to access financing solutions completely designed around your small business needs.

We actively help small businesses just like yours with:

  • Merchant Cash Advance
  • Line of Credit
  • Equipment Financing
  • Mortgage Financing
  • Term Loands
  • Factoring
  • P.O Financing

Spring Funding Group offers merchant cash advances, small business loans, SBA loans, equipment financing, factoring, purchase order financing, lines of credit, and commercial mortgages nationwide.

Small businesses face big problems finding real solutions to streamline financial and marketing functions. A poor credit rating, expensive credit card processing, outdated payroll systems, or a nonexistent web presence can all negatively affect your growth.

Spring Funding Group and its team of dedicated service advisors will help identify, optimize, and deploy the right business solutions to meet your needs. Including:

  • Credit Servicing (Personal & Business)
  • HR and Payroll Services
  • Credit Card Processing
  • Search Engine Optimization (SEO) and Web Development

Spring Funding Group offers personal and business credit servicing, credit card processing, payroll, website development, and SEO optimization.

header.value: Meet your Goals. Grow your Business.

subheader.value: Streamline financial and marketing systems to increase sales and improve the customer experience.

data.subheader: Alternative to lengthy approval processes and strict credit requirements for traditional term loans
data.note: A merchant cash advance (MCA) provides unsecured capital to small business owners on future credit card sales, providing small businesses an alternative to traditional bank loans. MCA quickly provides cash for businesses, allowing you to borrow against future earnings to access that capital today.
data.name: MCA
data.note2: Call us to speak to a loan specialist today.

merchant-cash-advance.header: Unsecured working capital when your business needs it

data.name: Factor rate range: 15% – 49%; the advance is at a fixed rate, not an APR
Repayment can be made on either a Daily, Weekly, Bi-Weekly, or Monthly payment
Repayment terms rage from 30 days up to 24 months
Repayment can be made through ACH Debits or Credit Card Processing Holdbacks
Funds can be sent in as quick as one business day
Funding amounts range from $2,000 up to $2,000,000
Additional stipulations may be requested, such as: proof of ownership, financials (P&L and balance sheet), tax returns, accounts receivable reports
Do you have any existing debt on your balance sheet? If yes, what are the balances owed and who are the balances owed to?
How do you plan on using the funding?
How quickly do you need funding?
Even if your credit score is low or you have negative financial history or the business is less than one year old, there are still funding options with a merchant cash advance
We can consolidate existing merchant cash advances to lower payments and increase cash flow
This is a fast and convenient process with minimal paperwork and same-day funding available
When the balance is 50% paid, your business will be eligible for additional funding
Great option of any business that is grossing $10,000 in revenue per month and has been in business for at least 6 months

data.subheader: A flexible loan that you can access as needed to borrow up to a certain amount over time.
data.note: A line of credit allows you to borrow funds for planned and unexpected expenses with a low rate. The approval process is fast and requires minimal paperwork.
data.name: Line of Credit
data.note2: Call us to speak to a specialist today.

line-of-credit.header: Revolving line of credit for instant access to funds

data.name: A business making more than $20,000 with owner(s) FICO scores above a 600 is provided with a revolving Line of Credit (LOC) at low rates
LOC is paid on a consistent predetermined schedule (weekly or monthly)
More funds are available to draw as the principal is paid down
Approvals are extremely fast, and the credit limit can increase as long as there is a good repayment history
Application with basic details about the business and merchant
Do you have any existing debt on your balance sheet? If yes, what are the balances owed and who are the balances owed to?
Do you anticipate needing funding anytime in the next 12 months?
What do you intend to do with the funds from a line of credit?
Why not set up a line of credit now for a rainy day, as you won’t be paying anything until you draw from it?
Repayment can be made on a weekly or monthly basis
Great option for business owners with a 600+ FICO score and grossing at least $20,000 per month

data.subheader: Putting a lien on equipment in order to obtain financing.
data.note: A fast funding option with affordable interest rates enabling your business to replace, upgrade, or purchase the equipment necessary to keep your venture operating smoothly. Equipment financing can also serve as a type of asset-based financing, where the equipment itself is used to back up or secure the loan.
data.name: Equipment Financing
data.note2: Call us to speak to a specialist today.

data.name: A lien put on currently-owned equipment in order to obtain funds for any purpose
A lien put on equipment that you are looking to buy in order to obtain funds for its purchase
The equipment’s marketability (how easy it would be to sell)
Your ability to pay back the loan
Year to date bank statements and financials
Do you have any valuable equipment?
What is the age and condition of the equipment?
Are you looking to buy any valuable equipment?
Is the equipment semi-liquid and market ready?
Equipment financing is a fast and simple way to fund up to 100% of the value of the equipment
Use our tax calculator to help identify your savings, first-year depreciation, and deductions.

data.note2: Call us to speak to a loan specialist today.

data.name: A lien is put on a currently-owned property in order to obtain funds for any purpose
A lien is put on a property that you are looking to buy in order to obtain funds for its purchase
The security and length of the loan
Property info: appraisal or broker’s opinion of value (BOV)
Personal financial statements – updated within last 60 days
Do you own any commercial property?
Are you looking to buy any commercial property?
Is the commercial property currently producing income?
Is there any debt on the property?
How many units are on the property?
Mortgage financing is only available for income-producing property
The most common way for a property to produce income is by having tenants
A property with both a business and a tenant on it is referred to as a mixed use property

data.subheader: A long-term loan that has a specified repayment schedule
data.note: A term loan gives you the cash to grow your business, whether it be to renovate office space or buying inventory. With a term loan, you borrow a lump of cash upfront for a specific purpose and repay the loan over a set period of time with fixed, equal payments.
data.name: Term Loan
data.note2: Call us to speak to a loan specialist today.

term-loan.header: Long-term financing with terms that will position you for growth

data.name: A business with strong credit is provided with a long term loan at our lowest rates
Loan is paid off in monthly increments
Loan is paid off over a period of 1-5 years
Overall financial health/profitability of the businesses
2 most recent years of business tax returns + 1 year personal
Personal financial statements – updated within last 60 days (balance sheet and P&L for any deal over $800,000)
Are you currently receiving any term loan financing?
Have you successfully paid off any past term loans?
What do you intend to do with your term loan?
Getting funded for a term loan is a more time-consuming process, usually taking between 2-3 weeks for an approval
Term loans offer the most generous loan rate available
In the event that you do not qualify for a term loan we will pinpoint the reasons and provide a plan to build you up for an approval down the line

data.subheader: A business advance collateralized by your outstanding invoices
data.note: Invoice factoring is a way for small businesses to take out a loan against unpaid customer invoices to quickly unlock funds from pending invoices for operational expenses and growth opportunities.
data.name: Factoring
data.note2: Call us to speak to a loan specialist today.

data.name: An invoice is a bill for goods or services already provided
A business sells its invoices to a third party (the factor) in order to meet its current obligations
The length of time until the invoice will be paid
Are you currently factoring any invoices?
Do you presently have a need for additional cash flow?
We only factor business to business transactions
Residual account; represents an ongoing relationship
With factoring you have the chance to get paid for your invoices right away – no need to wait

data.subheader: An advance collateralized by your business’ purchase orders
data.note: We provide working business capital based on your business' projected future sales. Businesses in high-risk industries, with financial problems or bad credit can be approved without any collateral.
data.name: P.O Financing
data.note2: Call us to speak to a loan specialist today.

data.name: Purchase orders are documents sent from a merchant to a provider with a request for an order
A business sells its purchase orders to a third party to obtain the funds necessary to satisfy the order
A list of unfulfilled purchase orders
Do you have any unfulfilled purchase orders?
Are you currently receiving purchase order financing?
Are you unable to make an initial payment for the order?
Purchase order financing is NOT a loan and therefore, you are not incurring any debt
The application required to establish a purchase order relationship is much simpler than other types of financing
With purchase order financing you can ONLY use the funds to assist with satisfying the order
Purchase order financing can support a single transaction and/or grow with your company’s funding requirements

data.subheader: Contact us today to learn more
data.note: Call now to speak to a loan specialist today

intro.header: Whatever your financial needs are - we got you covered
intro.content:
We provide working business capital based on your business’ projected future sales. Businesses in high-risk industries, with financial problems or bad credit, can be approved without any collateral.

If you are still not sure what solution is right for your company, that’s what we do. We analyze your financial and organizational situation and determine what financing options are right for you.

subheader.value: Even if your credit score is low or your business is less than one year old, there are still MCA options available

subheader.text: An alternative to traditional bank loans

body.html:
Applying for a merchant cash advance (MCA) is a fast and convenient process with minimal paperwork and the opportunity for same-day funding availability. Funding amounts range from $2,000 to $2,000,000.

Rates are based on overall financial health, credit profile, time in business, average monthly revenue, and industry.

subheader.text: Fast approvals available to provide instant access to funds

body.html:
A flexible loan to provide small business owners with a defined amount of money that can be accessed as needed and repaid either immediately or over time. Funds are revolving and can be accessed repeatedly without reapplying.

Great, low rate option for small business owners with a 600+ FICO score and grossing at least $20,000 per month.

subheader.value: More funds are available to draw from as the principal is paid down.
Pricing is by quotation, based on your unique situation.

subheader.text: Fix your FICO score in a heartbeat

body.html:
An improved credit rating allows merchants and individuals to qualify for better funding, lease/rentals, and insurance rates. To improve your credit, we remove problematic entries from your credit history.

As your credit improves, costs and expenses decrease, and your operational freedom increases in as little as 3 months. Raising your credit score a mere 20 points can save thousands of dollars over the life of a small business loan.

subheader.text: Get your mortgage under control

body.html:
The rates are based on security, the length of the loan, the loan to value ratio, and your credit. If you currently own or are looking to purchase commercial property, also consider how much income the property produces, and if there is any debt on the property.

The most common way for a property to produce income is by having tenants. A property with both a business and a tenant is referred to as a mixed-use property.

subheader.value: When your mind is free from financial worries, you have the space to focus on the moments in life that actually count.
If you do not qualify for a term loan, we will pinpoint the reasons why and provide a plan for approval.

subheader.text: Specified monthly repayment schedule

body.html:
Businesses with strong credit histories secure term loans at the very best rates available, between 7.9% and 24.99%. The rates vary based on your industry, how you will use the funds, your credit rating, and the overall financial health and profitability of your business.

Getting funded for a term loan is a more time-consuming process than other types of loans. It usually takes between 2 and 3 weeks for approval.

subheader.text: Putting a lien on equipment to obtain funds

body.html:
Equipment financing is a fast and straightforward way to fund up to 100% of the value of the equipment. Use our tax calculator to help identify your savings, first-year depreciation, and deductions.

The rates are based on the age and condition of the equipment, how easily it could be sold, your credit rating, and your ability to pay back the loan.

subheader.value: Customized answers provide precise solutions to manage your exact situation. Questions? Read our equipment financing FAQ’s.
With factoring, you sell your organization’s outstanding accounts receivables to a third party (the factor) to meet current cash flow obligations.

subheader.text: An advance collateralized by your business' outstanding invoices

body.html:
Your organization has already rendered the services to your customer. You are just waiting to get paid. Factoring means you get paid right away instead of waiting for your customer to pay.

The loan rates are based on the invoice holder’s (your customer’s) creditworthiness and how long it will be until the invoice is due.

subheader.text: An advance collateralized by your business' purchase orders

body.html:
You sell your organization’s purchase order amounts to a third party to obtain the funds necessary to satisfy the order. Rates are based on the security of the order, length of funding, and your credit rating.

With purchase order financing, you can ONLY use the funds to assist with satisfying the order. But it is NOT a loan, so you are not incurring any debt. Use purchase order financing to support a single transaction and/or grow with your company’s funding requirements.

subheader.value: The application required to establish a purchase order relationship is much simpler than other types of financing.
Online marketing provides tangible, trackable, quantifiable results, both for eCommerce and non-eCommerce sites. The first step to increasing your sales and your profits.

subheader.text: An internet presence is required to do business in today's market

body.html:
Even if you do not sell your products or services online, potential customers use your website as part of the research process before they buy.

Search Engine Optimization (SEO) increases the possibility your potential customers find your website using Google, Bing, Yahoo, or other search engines. SEO ensures your website appears in their search results.

Innovative web marketing solutions drive traffic, convert visitors, and measure effectiveness to deliver real results.

subheader.text: A staple for today's businesses

body.html:
Your customers expect seamless transactions on their credit and debit cards. Now you can process credit and debit card payments with state-of-the-art terminals, including wireless and online capabilities. All with the best rates on the market.

Lifetime support and training means every business, from entrepreneurs to Fortune 500 sized companies, suffer no interruption in business with new terminal installs.

subheader.value: Pay only a tiny fraction after your credit or debit card sales are processed.
Obtain critical services such as Payroll and tax filing, Hiring and H.R. management, Workers compensation, and Health insurance benefits.

subheader.text: Largest small business payroll management service nationwide

body.html:
Instantly preview required cases before finalizing payroll to avoid costly surprises. Reduce expenses and increase convenience as you process payroll anytime, anywhere, even on your phone.

Safe, A.A. rated, outsourced payroll, benefits administration, and H.R. management save precious time, so your staff focus on the activities only they can perform.

data.header: We are here when you need a boost
data.subheader: Thank you for placing your trust in us. We will hold your hand along the way.

data.text: We can help your business succeed with fast and effective alternative funding for every type of business.
Our financing solutions help keep small businesses going—and growing. Learn more today.
A cash infusion to overcome the challenges and rise from the ashes of Corona stronger and more resilient than ever.

subheader.text:
Our mission is to provide a broad array of services and solutions for small businesses. We offer merchant cash advances, small business loans, SBA loans, equipment financing, factoring, purchase order financing, and commercial mortgages nationwide.

We will find you the best option for your business regardless of bad credit, high-risk business types, or financial issues. We also offers credit card processing, personal and business credit servicing, payroll services, and SEO and web development.

Our goal is to build a strong working relationship, in order to help small businesses stay competitive and grow by providing revolving financing as needed until the business can improve its credit and qualify for a traditional loan.

header.value: Accelerate the growth of your business

subheader.value: Small Business Loans. Merchant Cash Advances. Payroll, HR, Employee Benefits. Websites & SEO.

note.value: Over 100 funding specialists to keep you going
15 financing options and small business products
Unsecured funding up to $2,000,000
Get funding in 48 hours

header.value: What our clients are saying about our solutions

subheader.value: Our Financial Solutions and Business Services support our clients as they stay competitive and grow to keep our nation’s economy alive.

data.testimonial: Proud owner of a restaurant in California and was seeking capital to open a second location. My specialist at got me the exact dollar amount I needed to open, including renovation and equipment costs.

Professional staff helped guide us through getting our first business loan to acquire extra space and buy more shelving for our retail store. The loan helped us get an immediate return within 4 months as we got more in sales and a few self-checkout registers so there is minimal wait time for the customers.

My specialist helped us get the funding we need to get some upgrades done. With low rates we were able to borrow and pay back overtime and noticed how we got more customers as a result. Loan paid for itself in 1-2 years!

intro.header: Don’t take our word for it.
intro.content:
Every business needs working capital to thrive and many businesses rely on small business loans and merchant cash advances to operate and grow. We are positioned to help your business succeed and provide alternatives to traditional bank financing to purchase equipment, expand, or just fund day-to-day operations.

From medical offices to restaurants to contractors and retail stores, our financing solutions help keep small businesses going – and growing. Our customers represent a diverse array of industries; we take special care to build a strong working relationship with each and every one of them.

Read reviews directly from our customers:

subheader.value: These professionals worked with me to figure out what we can afford to pay.

subheader.text: Owns furniture store

body.html:
My loan specialist answered all of my questions and helped me figure out the best options for my needs and budget. I was offered flexibility to help us get the money we needed to grow our privately-owned furniture store in Queens.
I recommend dealing with these guys!

details.class: col-11 col-sm-12 col-lg-8 text-start mt-5 mb-5 mx-auto

subheader.text: Retail store owner

body.html:
We have a retail store and we’re acquiring extra space in the store and also needed to buy more shelves so we can store more things in the store as well.

The loan helped us get an immediate return within 4 months as we got more in sales and a few self-checkout registers so there is minimal wait time for the customers.

subheader.value: Professional staff helped guide us through getting our first loan for our business.

details.class: col-11 col-sm-12 col-lg-8 text-start mt-5 mb-5 mx-auto

subheader.value: We are even busier with our better targeted ads; doing a great job.

subheader.text: Online store owner

body.html:
I was looking for a loan to upgrade our servers and office equipment. We also purchased some new computers and printers to expand our company.

Within 3 weeks we were able to increase our workload with additional staff and faster computers; we’ve gotten this far thanks to them!

details.class: col-11 col-sm-12 col-lg-8 text-start mt-5 mb-5 mx-auto

subheader.text: Small business owner

body.html:
I worked with a specialist to set up my payroll and payment processing for my small business. The whole process was seamless and saved me a lot of time so that I now can focus on my other business needs.

They not only helped me establish my business credit, but my personal credit as well. I highly recommend their services.
